attributes.action: MAKE A LIFE SENTENCE MEAN A LIFE SENTENCE IN PRISON IN UK
attributes.additional_details:
A life sentence should mean life in prison without parole or any form of release.
My Dad was tortured and murdered in 2002 and his two killers were sentenced to life in prison with a minimum of 14 years. 12 years passed and one of them has been granted first term release. My dad doesn't get his life back why should the evil sadistic men get theirs back!
MAKE A LIFE SENTENCE MEAN A LIFE SENTENCE IN PRISON!
